info.report-description: LTE Power and Quality DL measurement (M8010) measures DL connection quality related measurements.

kpi_info.title: period_duration (period_duration)
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes.

kpi_info.title: UE_REP_CQI_LEVEL_00 (M8010C36)
kpi_info.use: UE reported (wideband) Channel Quality Indicator CQI class 00 UPDATED: The counter is updated when CQI value 0 is received from the UE.

kpi_info.title: UE_REP_CQI_LEVEL_01 (M8010C37)
kpi_info.use: UE reported (wideband) Channel Quality Indicator CQI class 01 UPDATED: The counter is updated when CQI value 1 is received from the UE.

kpi_info.title: UE_REP_CQI_LEVEL_02 (M8010C38)
kpi_info.use: UE reported (wideband) Channel Quality Indicator CQI class 02 UPDATED: The counter is updated when CQI value 2 is received from the UE.

kpi_info.title: UE_REP_CQI_LEVEL_03 (M8010C39)
kpi_info.use: UE reported (wideband) Channel Quality Indicator CQI class 03 UPDATED: The counter is updated when CQI value 3 is received from the UE.

kpi_info.title: UE_REP_CQI_LEVEL_04 (M8010C40)
kpi_info.use: UE reported (wideband) Channel Quality Indicator CQI class 04 UPDATED: The counter is updated when CQI value 4 is received from the UE.

kpi_info.title: UE_REP_CQI_LEVEL_05 (M8010C41)
kpi_info.use: UE reported (wideband) Channel Quality Indicator CQI class 05 UPDATED: The counter is updated when CQI value 5 is received from the UE.

kpi_info.title: UE_REP_CQI_LEVEL_06 (M8010C42)
kpi_info.use: UE reported (wideband) Channel Quality Indicator CQI class 06 UPDATED: The counter is updated when CQI value 6 is received from the UE.

kpi_info.title: UE_REP_CQI_LEVEL_07 (M8010C43)
kpi_info.use: UE reported (wideband) Channel Quality Indicator CQI class 07 UPDATED: The counter is updated when CQI value 7 is received from the UE.

kpi_info.title: UE_REP_CQI_LEVEL_08 (M8010C44)
kpi_info.use: UE reported (wideband) Channel Quality Indicator CQI class 08 UPDATED: The counter is updated when CQI value 8 is received from the UE.

kpi_info.title: UE_REP_CQI_LEVEL_09 (M8010C45)
kpi_info.use: UE reported (wideband) Channel Quality Indicator CQI class 09 UPDATED: The counter is updated when CQI value 9 is received from the UE.

kpi_info.title: UE_REP_CQI_LEVEL_10 (M8010C46)
kpi_info.use: UE reported (wideband) Channel Quality Indicator CQI class 10 UPDATED: The counter is updated when CQI value 10 is received from the UE.

kpi_info.title: UE_REP_CQI_LEVEL_11 (M8010C47)
kpi_info.use: UE reported (wideband) Channel Quality Indicator CQI class 11 UPDATED: The counter is updated when CQI value 11 is received from the UE.

kpi_info.title: UE_REP_CQI_LEVEL_12 (M8010C48)
kpi_info.use: UE reported (wideband) Channel Quality Indicator CQI class 12 UPDATED: The counter is updated when CQI value 12 is received from the UE.

kpi_info.title: UE_REP_CQI_LEVEL_13 (M8010C49)
kpi_info.use: UE reported (wideband) Channel Quality Indicator CQI class 13 UPDATED: The counter is updated when CQI value 13 is received from the UE.

kpi_info.title: UE_REP_CQI_LEVEL_14 (M8010C50)
kpi_info.use: UE reported (wideband) Channel Quality Indicator CQI class 14 UPDATED: The counter is updated when CQI value 14 is received from the UE.

kpi_info.title: UE_REP_CQI_LEVEL_15 (M8010C51)
kpi_info.use: UE reported (wideband) Channel Quality Indicator CQI class 15 UPDATED: The counter is updated when CQI value 15 is received from the UE.

kpi_info.title: CQI_OFF_MIN (M8010C52)
kpi_info.use: Minimum CQI offset applied in link adaption process from outer loop link adaptation on the reported CQI values from UE UPDATED: The counter is updated when the minimum assumed CQI in LA process is obtained from CQI reports and corrected by Outer Loop Quality Control.

kpi_info.title: CQI_OFF_MAX (M8010C53)
kpi_info.use: Maximum CQI offset applied in link adaption process from outer loop link adaptation on the reported CQI values from UE UPDATED: The counter is updated when the maximum assumed CQI in LA process is obtained from CQI reports and corrected by Outer Loop Quality Control.

kpi_info.title: CQI_OFF_MEAN (M8010C54)
kpi_info.use: Mean CQI offset applied in link adaption process from outer loop link adaptation on the reported CQI values from UE UPDATED: The counter is updated when the mean assumed CQI in LA process is obtained from CQI reports and corrected by Outer Loop Quality Control.

kpi_info.title: MIMO_OL_DIV (M8010C55)
kpi_info.use: The sum of MIMO Open Loop Diversity mode usage. UPDATED: The counter is updated when diversity MIMO mode is selected for the transmission. It counts the number of MIMO Open Loop Actual Diversity mode usage for both new transmissions and retransmissions.

kpi_info.title: MIMO_OL_SM (M8010C56)
kpi_info.use: The sum of MIMO Open Loop Spatial Multiplexing mode usage. UPDATED: The counter is updated when spatial multiplexing MIMO mode is selected for the transmission. It counts the number of MIMO Open Loop Actual Spatial Multiplexing mode usage for both new transmissions and retransmissions.

kpi_info.title: MIMO_CL_1CW (M8010C57)
kpi_info.use: The number of times when MIMO Closed loop 1 Code Word mode is used. UPDATED: The counter is updated when MIMO Closed Loop Single Codeword mode is selected for the transmission. It counts the number of MIMO Closed Loop Actual Single Codeword mode usage for both new transmissions and retransmissions.

kpi_info.title: MIMO_CL_2CW (M8010C58)
kpi_info.use: The number of times when MIMO Closed loop 2 Code Word mode is used. UPDATED: The counter is updated when MIMO Closed Loop Double Codeword mode is selected for the transmission. It counts the number of MIMO Closed Loop Actual Double Codeword mode usage for both new transmissions and retransmissions.

kpi_info.title: MIMO_SWITCH_OL (M8010C59)
kpi_info.use: The number of Open Loop MIMO mode switches in downlink. UPDATED: This counter is updated when MIMO mode control is changed between the diversity mode and the spatial multiplexing mode transmission. It counts selected transmission mode changes only on the basis of the new CQI / RI value decisions according to MIMO algorithm. However, this counter does not these mode changes count if transmission mode changes in case of retransmissions or transmissions not needing MIMO due to small amount of data.

kpi_info.title: MIMO_SWITCH_CL (M8010C60)
kpi_info.use: The number of MIMO Closed loop Code Word mode switchings. UPDATED: The counter is updated when MIMO mode control is changed between the single codeword mode and the double codeword mode transmission. It counts selected transmission mode changes only on the basis of the new CQI / RI value decisions according to MIMO algorithm. However, this counter does not count these mode changes if transmission mode changes in case of retransmissions or transmissions not needing MIMO due to small amount of data.

kpi_info.title: PDCCH_ALLOC_PDSCH_HARQ (M8010C61)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of dedicated PDCCH resource allocations (eNB -> UE) for PDSCH transmissions with HARQ reporting;that is this counter provides the number of dedicated PDCCH resource allocations by which the eNB informs a dedicated UE on the PDCCH about the allocated PDSCH resources which are used for PDSCH transmissions with HARQ reporting. This counter is updated irrespective of whether the eNB was able to detect the HARQ response (ACK/NACK) from the UE or not. UPDATED: The counter is updated when PDCCH is allocated for PDSCH transmission.

kpi_info.title: PDCCH_ALLOC_PDSCH_HARQ_NO_RES (M8010C62)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of dedicated PDCCH resource allocations (eNB -> UE) for PDSCH transmissions with HARQ reporting in case that the eNB was not able to detect the HARQ response (ACK/NACK) from the UE;that is this counter provides the number of dedicated PDCCH resource allocations by which the eNB informs a dedicated UE on the PDCCH about the allocated PDSCH resources which are used for PDSCH transmissions with HARQ reporting in case that the eNB was not able to detect the HARQ response (ACK/NACK) from the UE. This counter is only updated when the eNB was not able to detect the HARQ response (ACK/NACK) from the UE. Therefore, either a transmission error for the downlink PDCCH resource allocation (eNB -> UE) or a transmission error for the uplink HARQ response (UE -> eNB) has occured. UPDATED: The counter is updated when DTX is received for PDSCH transmission.

kpi_info.title: TM8_DUAL_BF_MODE (M8010C63)
kpi_info.use: Number of times when PDSCH transmission mode is dual stream beamforming in TM8. UPDATED: The counter is incremented on each PDSCH transmission with dual stream beamforming mode in TM8.

kpi_info.title: TM8_SINGLE_BF_MODE (M8010C64)
kpi_info.use: Number of times when PDSCH transmission mode is single stream beamforming in TM8. UPDATED: The counter is incremented on each PDSCH transmission with single stream beamforming mode in TM8.

kpi_info.title: TM8_TXDIV_MODE (M8010C65)
kpi_info.use: Number of times when PDSCH transmission mode is transmission diversity in TM8. UPDATED: The counter is incremented on each PDSCH transmission with transmit diversity mode in TM8.

kpi_info.title: TM8_DUAL_USER_SINGLE_BF_MODE (M8010C66)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of PDSCH transmissions in dual-user single-stream beamforming mode in TM8. UPDATED: The counter is incremented on each PDSCH transmission with dual-user single-stream beamforming mode in TM8.

kpi_info.title: PDCCH_POWER_AVG (M8010C67)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides final PDCCH power per RE per DCI in each TTI without considering the cell/OFDM-symbol wide positive or negative adjustments. The reported value [in dBm] is 100 times higher than the actual value (for example 1.00 is stored as 100). UPDATED: The counter is updated in each TTI by the average amount of PDCCH power as specified in the counter description.

kpi_info.title: TM7_BF_MODE (M8010C68)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of PDSCH transmissions in TM7 (single-stream beamforming mode). UPDATED: The counter is incremented on each PDSCH transmission in TM7 (single-stream beamforming mode).

kpi_info.title: TM7_TXDIV_MODE (M8010C69)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of PDSCH transmissions in TM7 (TxDiv mode). UPDATED: The counter is incremented on each PDSCH transmission in TM7 (TxDiv mode).

kpi_info.title: AVG_TRANS_PWR (M8010C74)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the average transmit power in milliwatts at the end of the collection interval. UPDATED: This measurement calculates the estimated transmitted power (in milliwatts) every sample period and averages the values at the end of the collection interval.

kpi_info.title: MAX_TRANS_PWR (M8010C75)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the maximum transmit power in milliwatts at the end of the collection interval. UPDATED: This measurement calculates the estimated transmitted power (in milliwatts) every sample period and determines the maximum value at the end of the collection interval.

kpi_info.title: period_duration_sum (period_duration_sum)
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes. Values summed up also in object dimension.
